{{disambig-more: '''''JRR Tolkien: The True Lord of the Rings''''' is a biography of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in a graphic novel format.

JRR Tolkien: He imagined realms of wizards, orcs and hobbits and elevated fantasy from pulp to respected literature. J.R.R. Tolkien, the iconic author who captivated generations with his rich and complex mythology of Middle Earth, is the subject of his own tale in a special edition of Bluewater Productions' latest biography comic title "Orbit."}}

{{disambig-more: *[http://sacnoths.blogspot.se/2012/09/j-r-r-tolkien-comic-book.html J.R.R. Tolkien: The Comic Book] by [[John D. Rateliff]]
